title: Identify ions X and Y in solution

content.description: The diagram shown represents water molecules ( ) as they interact with two ions, <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>Y</mtext> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>, in solution.
content.question:

skill.text: 1.A: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate particulate-level properties only.
